forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 46. Southwest wind 1 to 5 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a generous sun, casting a warm embrace upon the city. The air is clear and crisp, a rare blessing that allows the distant Golden Gate Bridge to stand proud against the blue expanse. The gentle north-northeast wind stirs softly, whispering secrets of the bay as it meanders through the streets. Temperatures hover near the mid-60s, offering a pleasant contrast to the coolness of the evening that will eventually descend, inviting a crisp low around 46 degrees.

As the day drifts toward dusk, the clarity remains unbroken by fog; the marine layer, typical for this coastal city, seems to hold its breath and stay at bay. It’s a perfect moment to walk through the neighborhoods, perhaps to savor a cup of coffee at a local café or lose oneself in the pages of a good book while sitting in one of the parks. With the alight sun weaving golden threads through the skyline, the evening invites casual outings - a stroll along the Embarcadero or an intimate dinner with views of the cityscape. In essence, the day makes a promise of comfort and leisure, urging you to slip into a light jacket as night approaches, ensuring warmth without losing the delightfully fresh air.
